Axle and Final Drive.Reduction and differential gear: Two stage reduction with torque proportional differential

Brakes.Parking Brake: Spring applied, hydraulically released, wet disc type
Brakes.Service Brakes: Inboard mounted fully hydraulic 4 wheel wet disc brakes. Front & rear independent brake circuit, HST (Hydro Static Transmission) system provides additional hydraulic braking capacity

Engine.Air Cleaner: Two element dry type with restriction indicator
Engine.Bore and Stroke: 3.9 in x 4.7 in (98 mm x 120 mm)
Engine.Emission: Complies with EU stage IV and US EPA Tier 4 Final

Hydraulic System.Arm Controls: Four position valve; Raise, hold, lower, float Bucket controls with automatic bucket return to-dig control
Hydraulic System.Filters: Full-flow 10 micron return filter in reservoir
Hydraulic System.HST charging pump: Gear type 10.4 gal/min (39.2 L/min) at 2,000 min (rpm) at 2.5 MPa (25 kgf/cm2)
Hydraulic System.Hydraulic cylinders - No. x Bore x Strok: Arm: 2 x 4.1 in x 28.0 in (2 x 105 mm x 710 mm) Bucket: 1 x 4.9 in x 17.5 in (1 x 125 mm x 445 mm)
Hydraulic System.Main pump (Load & steer): Gear type 32.0 gal/min (121 L/min) at 2,000 min-1 (rpm) at 20.6 MPa (210 kgf/cm2)
Hydraulic System.Transmission charging pump: Gear type 5.9 gal/min (22 L/min) at 2,000 min (rpm) at 1.8 MPa (18 kgf/cm2

Power Train.Transmission: Electrical-controlled 1 motor hydrostatic transmission with gear box, Gear box: Fixed gear ratio, powershift countershaft type

Steering System.No. x Bore x Stroke: 2 x 2.4 in x 15.6 in (2 x 60 mm x 395 mm)
